verbs.description: [ARG1: The U.S. dollar] [V: slipped] [ARGM-ADV: against the Japanese yen] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] , [ARGM-TMP: as President Donald Trump announced hefty tariffs on $ 50 billion of Chinese imports] .
The U.S. dollar slipped against the Japanese yen on Friday , as [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: hefty tariffs on $ 50 billion of Chinese imports] .
